_aChangeLog.text: Reduced timers again all over the map. Less defend times for humans now. More easy to win.
Increased lights and brightness all over the surf and kz levels.
Improved all bhop levels and reduced difficulty especially on Bhop03-Segment.
Reduced laserboss hp on sphinx ending and added a trigger so as to fix the humans getting pass the lasers.
Added more time for AFK_Tele on Defence01 Level so as to give humans more time to do surf.
Increased damage substraction for Strider and Charger. x2 damage/bullet now.
Added more guidlines and commands for humans to follow the path.
This is the final version and no updates would be released for this map. Entwatch and BossHUD is included in the .rar file. Stripper isn't needed because all bugs are fixed.
Reduced timers after spider boss fight and increased the ZM tp time after that.
Added more time for zombies to teleport after surf02-03. (45seconds for humans to complete surf/bhop levels)
Fixed the jump part near spawn. Reduced jump distance and removed Human killer trigger.
Added more hp to all bosses hitbox, all hitboxes are fixed.
Removed a box on the first defence so humans won't always camp there.

_sText:
** ze_surf_sphinx_stronghold_a5 **
** Map made for NiDE Mapping Contest 2024 **

Map contains:
- 2 Different Endings (Sphinx and Stronghold)
- 3 Boss Fights 
  1. Strider
  2. Charger
  3. Alien Spider(only on sphinx ending)
- 2 Items for Zombies (Zombie Speeder & Zombie Invisibility)
- 1 Destructive Item for Humans - Railgun - Cooldown = 105(s)
- 6 Surf Levels
- 3 Alternate Routes for Surf (incase people prefer bhop easier with low gravity)
- Hardest map in Zombie Escape Surf History (!nerfed it now)
- Lasers at the end of the round in Sphinx Ending
- 64 Spawns

** You are not allowed to edit, re-upload and port this map. This map is made for CS:S Only **
